column2: Firien Wood]], around the feet of the [[Halifirien]] in the [[White Mountains]]. The great hunter [[Folca]] of [[Rohan]], having rid his country of the [[Orcs]], set out to hunt down the [[Boars
column3: boar]]. He succeeded, but received mortal tusk-wounds that brought his Kingship to an end.<ref>{{App
